title: "nerf lee sin"

lol heres a funny thing with all the hate over lee sin... i would never ban him... chances are if he is picked by the other team he would be more of a liability on him then a god on him . 

and if you just avoid his early level ganks where he is a god , easily by map awareness and warding... he falls off like a rock after 20 mins in a game 

and the lil changes they made to him did effect him in a big way, also with the changes to zac and sej tank junglers are in a better spot...

I agree. Also {{champion:157}} did receive a nerf recently for those still complaining about him. he was by no means gutted, but he has to release his tornado sooner. Also why is no one complaining about {{champion:240}}. If you do like 1k magic damage on him when his skarl shield has like 50 hp left on it, that 1k damage now becomes 50. He does not take any exra damage outside of the 50 unless his own hp is at 50 otherwise he just gets knocked off skarl.

Listen you skilless brainfucks. Learn how to play against these champs and stop complaining. There's a reason why {{champion:17}} is still in this game. Just learn to enjoy the game and stop complaing of "omg he's op", just because you got killed by one in lane.
